translated: Six times I was king of the gods,
Three times I was a universal monarch;
I had a vast kingdom,
incalculable in number.
Wandering in existence,
I obtained great wealth;
I had no lack of wealth,
this is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.
I wander in two existences,
among the gods and among humans;
I do not know of any other state,
this is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.
I am born in two families,
among the nobles and among the brahmins;
I am not born in a low family,
this is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.
The elephant-vehicle, the horse-vehicle,
the sedan-chair and the palanquin;
I obtain all of these,
this is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.
A group of female slaves and a group of male slaves,
Women adorned with ornaments;
I obtain all of these,
This is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.
Silk blankets,
Cotton and linen;
I obtain all of these,
This is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.
New clothes, new fruits,
New delicious food;
I obtain all of these,
This is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.
Eat this, enjoy this,
Sleep on this bed;
I obtain all of these,
This is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.
Everywhere I am worshipped,
My fame has spread;
I always have a large following,
My retinue is always inseparable;
I am the best of relatives,
This is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.
I do not know cold or heat,
Fever does not exist;
And mental suffering,
Does not exist in my heart.
Having become golden-colored,
I wander through existence and rebirth;
I do not know ugliness,
This is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.

this is the result of worshipping the Buddha.
